name: ID Patdu
text: Another problem though is that sometimes, the lowest bidder that meets the specs, the quality is not good. Problema din kasi ito sa medical equipment.  Yung mura, madaling masira.  O kaya sasabihin kaya mameet ang specs, magdadagdag lang ng adaptor o anu pa man. May warranty man, ang epekto tuwing masisira, aayusin man nila, matitigil ang serbisyo.  Umangal man ang end-user, wala na ring magawa. (Ex. Made in ____ v. Made in ____)
